alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 3:49PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Wakulla and northeastern Franklin Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 348 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Crawfordville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sopchoppy, Alligator Point, Saint Teresa, Bald Point, Panacea-Wakulla Airport, Mcintyre, Tully, Panacea, Shell Point, Medart, Buckhorn, Spring Creek, Liveoak Island and Curtis Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla
